ai-patthana15.31:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.31:0.3_0: Next there are heated to the boats.
ai-patthana15.31:1.1_0: Everyone present can give rise to skillful qualities. But this is a cause of unskillful qualities to be skillful.
ai-patthana15.31:2.1_0: Every unskillful can be seen, heard, thought, or known by the mind.
ai-patthana15.31:3.1_0: this is not cause or reason for anyone else to understand this.
ai-patthana15.31:4.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the partner is finished.
